company_description: BlaBlaCar is a carpooling platform that connects drivers with empty seats to passengers traveling in the same direction, providing an affordable and sustainable transportation alternative.
founders: Francis Nappez, Frédéric Mazzella, Nicolas Brusson
universities: Joseph Fourier Grenoble, Lycee Henri IV, Stanford, INSEAD
embedding_text: BlaBlaCar is a carpooling platform that connects drivers with empty seats to passengers traveling in the same direction, providing an affordable and sustainable transportation alternative.
